PET_FUNCTIONAL¶

Contains functionality of Pet’s

class pet_store.pet_func.pet_functional.PetDriver(url)[source]¶

Contains each each action, which we can do with Pet

Constants:
__URL: end of the original link __HEADERS_SINGLE: single header for simple request __HEADERS_UPDATE: headers for update pet by post request __HEADERS_DOUBLE: header for creating pet by post request
__init__(url)[source]¶

Create url for requests

Parameters:url – original host URL
create_pet(obj)[source]¶

Create new pet on the server

Parameters:obj – “objectify” of pet
Return Pet:new “objectify” from created pet on the server
delete_pet(id_)[source]¶

Delete existing pet from server

Parameters:id – pet’s ID
Returns:answer of deleting pet
get_pet(id_)[source]¶

Get existing pet from Server

Parameters:id – pet’s ID
Return Pet:return Pet
get_xml(id_)[source]¶

Get XML of existing Pet from the server

Parameters:id – pet’s ID
Returns:Pet’s XML
update(id_, name=None, status=None)[source]¶

Update existing pet on the server

Parameters:
  • id – pet’s ID
  • name (Optional[str]) – new pet name
  • status (Optional[PetStatus]) – new status for pet from pet_status enum
